item.title: TryHackMe Writeup - Basic Pentesting
item.description: Here’s my writeup for the Basic Pentesting challege on TryHackme. This challenge provides multiple ‘checkpoints’ with hand-holding hints that are often dead giveaways to ensure that you’re on the right track and that you can make it through the challenge in order to absorb all of the knowledge. It’s much more about testing your basic proficiency with tools, not about testing your guessing skills, or how you fair left to your own devices.
